title.en: Prayer on the Occasion of the Reading Transmission for the Omniscient King of Dharma's Thirteen-Volume Collected Writings

text.en: From the cloud-banks of blessings from the Mañjughoṣa Guru1
Falls the gentle rain of sūtra and mantra jewels
text.en-trans: do ngak norbü druchar lhukpar jo

text.en: To be placed atop the victory banner of Kunga’s teachings—2
Glorious guru, at your feet I pray!
text.en-trans: palden lamé zhab la solwa deb

text.en: Supreme of those endowed with splendid altruism and loving kindness,
You discern the ways of Dharma with threefold wisdom
text.en-trans: sherabsum gyi chö tsul nampar jé

text.en: In the fine mansion of authentic view, meditation and conduct—
text.en-trans: yangdak ta gom chöpé khang zang du

text.en: Great spiritual friend, to you I pray!
text.en-trans: ten ché shenyen chenpor solwa deb

text.en: May I and others develop impeccable ethical discipline,
text.en-trans: dak sok tsultrim nampar dakpa dang

text.en: May renunciation and twofold bodhicitta awaken in our being,
text.en-trans: ngejung changchub sem nyi gyü la kyé

text.en: May we perfectly traverse the paths of the two stages
text.en-trans: rim nyi lam gyi dröpar tarchin né

text.en: And ultimately attain the level of a Dharma Sovereign!
text.en-trans: chö kyi gyalpö gopang tobpar shok
